it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.client

Class RMIClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.client.RMIClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientInterface, java.rmi.Remote, java.util.Observer

    public class RMIClient
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer, ClientInterface
    The client that connects to the server thanks to RMI
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari
